thread.title: We ought to proceed onward to the following movies: Kangana on ‘Katti Batti’ disappointment
thread.title_full: We ought to proceed onward to the following movies: Kangana on ‘Katti Batti’ disappointment

author: CanIndia News Service 1
title: We ought to proceed onward to the following movies: Kangana on ‘Katti Batti’ disappointment
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Mumbai, October 2 (CINEWS): After two effective movies “Queen ” and ‘Tanu Weds Manu Returns’, Kangana neglected to inspire in the cinematic world with ‘Katti Batti’. Talking about the film’s disappointment at a late occasion, the on-screen character trusts it’s an ideal opportunity to proceed onward to the following film. 
As indicated by reports, it was Salman Khan who suggested Kangana’s name for the film. At the point when the film fizzled, all fingers were pointed at Salman for impacting her choice to take up the film. However,Salman cleared up that he had recently prescribed the on-screen character’s name to observe the script, and it was exclusively her choice to sign the film. 
“I imagine that film is done, and we all ought to proceed onward to next movies. What’s more, amid the advancements a considerable measure was talked about. How about we discuss the accumulations that I have lost today,” she said. 
Kangana’s co-star Imran Khan, was putting money on the film to resuscitate his acting profession. Be that as it may, unfortunately the film didn’t help revive his profession. Related Posts
